name: AR Glity
description:
Final work for the Master's Degree in Visual Poetics (PPGAV/UFRGS) with the Public Situations Research: Project and Projection. A mockary towards current visual prothesis. Carried out during the period of social isolation caused by the emergence of the COVID-19 pandemic. 2021.
Selected to be part of the Museum Exhibition (2021).
Selected to be part of the Homeostasis Lab Virtual Art Show (2021).
